channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Choose a Computer Monitor (2025): Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Monitors are cheaper, faster, and more beautiful than ever. Here’s how to choose one that will suit your needs and budget.

item.title: Apple’s App Course Runs $20,000 a Student. Is It Really Worth It?
item.description: Apple, Michigan taxpayers, and one of Detroit’s wealthiest families spent roughly $30 million training hundreds of people to build iPhone apps. Not ev...

item.title: 25 Work From Home Gift Ideas
item.description: Upgrade your loved one’s home office with these picks that make every day a little easier—and a little more fun.

item.title: JBL Bar 500MK2 Review: A Fantastic Soundbar System
item.description: This compact 2.1 soundbar system offers realistic Dolby Atmos surround sound.

item.title: Waymo is testing Gemini as an in-car AI assistant in its robotaxis
item.description: Waymo is testing a Gemini-powered in-car AI assistant, per findings from a 1,200-line system prompt. The assistant can answer general knowledge questi...

item.title: The year data centers went from backend to center stage
item.description: Data centers are no longer the boring tech issue they once were.

item.title: The 9 top biotech startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the biotech and pharma Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: The Best Desk Accessories (2025)
item.description: Brighten up your bare desk with these cute, fidgety, functional, and stylish desk accessories.

item.title: The European startup market’s data doesn’t match its energy — yet
item.description: Europe's startup market hasn't produced meaningful numbers but there is reason to believe the data will start to change.

item.title: Waymo explains why its robotaxis got stuck during the SF blackout
item.description: The company also said its robotaxis navigated more than 7,000 dark stoplights successfully on Saturday.
